title: Custom Carpets CTA image: full-bleed cover with sharp edges

requirements.summary: Adjust only the Custom Carpets CTA image element so it renders full-bleed edge-to-edge with cover fit and no rounded corners.
acceptanceCriteria: On all breakpoints, the selected image renders edge-to-edge across the viewport width (no visible left/right margins around the image).
The selected image uses a cover-style fit (no distortion; cropped as needed).
The selected image has sharp corners (no rounding on the image itself).
No other elements besides the selected image element are modified.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the element identified by the provided XPath by adjusting its className and/or inline style to (1) render as a full-bleed 100vw image with no side margins (e.g., using viewport-width sizing with centering/negative margins), (2) ensure cover-style fitting (object-cover with an explicit height/aspect strategy), and (3) remove any rounding on the image itself (e.g., rounded-none). Do not modify any surrounding wrappers or other DOM nodes.
